title: Phase 1: Add Basic Protection (Rate Limiting & Connection Management)
description:
Implement rate limiting and connection management to prevent spam and DoS attacks. This is critical before any public deployment.

Key components needed:
- Rate limiting per IP and global (EVENT, REQ, connection limits)
- Connection pool management with max connections per IP
- Event size validation and frequency controls
- Configurable limits via config file
- Rate limiter state management

This addresses the most critical security gap in current implementation.
